txt.en: You notice the stench of death in Baiúrz-mur. There are as many dead Orcs as living ones in this passage.\n\nYou should investigate the corpses to see what caused their untimely death in such great numbers. There is likely a correlation between the brewing of poisons by the defilers, and the death of the smaller Orcs.

The defilers and their masters used lesser Orcs as tasters for the poisons brewed in Baiúrz-mur.\n\nThe defilers' poison has been carefully brewed to take down any living creature, even the hardy Orcs. It is yet another mark of their cruelty that they should test the poisons upon the lips of their own kind.
You notice the stench of death in Baiúrz-mur. There are as many dead Orcs as living ones in this passage.
You find an empty bottle with a faint odour of poison. This Orc was a taste-tester of the vile brew.
Search the corpses of Orcs for a cause of death ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Orc-corpses can be found throughout Baiúrz-mur.\n\nYou should search the corpses of Orcs in the passage for signs of what caused them to die.

The defilers and their masters used lesser Orcs as tasters for the poisons brewed in Baiúrz-mur.\n\nThe defilers' poison has been carefully brewed to take down any living creature, even the hardy Orcs.
